text:
Aaron Tveit Details SWEENEY TODD Barber Chair Mishap

February 23, 2024



What happens when the iconic barber chair in Sweeney Todd doesn't work? Aaron Tveit found out last week. A couple performances into his run as the Demon Barber of Fleet Street, Tveit said that the gag where a body is slides down on a chute did not work due to an onstage mishap. Watch the clip now! (more...)

Go Inside Rehearsals for the GRAND HOTEL 35th Anniversary Reunion Concert

February 24, 2024



Get a look inside rehearsals for Grand Hotel: The 35th Anniversary Original Broadway Cast Reunion Concert at 54 Below in the video here! (more...)

Get A First Look at the Sets of Disney's HERCULES in Hamburg

February 22, 2024



Watch as Set Designer Dane Laffrey and Director Casey Nicholaw take you inside the studio for a first look at the set designs for the world premiere of the new production of Disney's Hercules in Hamburg in an all-new video. (more...)

Watch Taylor Swift Play Maria in THE SOUND OF MUSIC

February 21, 2024



After photos of the Taylor Swift playing Sandy in Grease surfaced earlier this year, new videos of the GRAMMY-winner playing Maria in a youth production of The Sound of Music is gaining traction on TikTok. Swift played the role in a childrens production at Berks Youth Theatre Academy, where she also played Kim McAfee in Bye, Bye Birdie. (more...)

Watch Jordan Fisher & Ani DiFranco Perform From HADESTOWN

February 23, 2024



Grammy-Award winner Ani DiFranco and Broadway sensation Jordan Fisher joined “Tamron Hall” to discuss starring in the hit Broadway musical, “Hadestown.” The duo also performed stripped-back versions of 'Flowers' and 'Our Lady of the Underground' with the Hadestown band. Watch videos from the episode now! (more...)

Watch Corey Cott & More in THE HEART OF ROCK AND ROLL Music Video

February 23, 2024



Check out a brand-new music video from the cast of The Heart of Rock and Roll on Broadway! (more...)

Anne Hathaway Has Emotional Reaction to Barbra Streisand at the SAG Awards

February 25, 2024



Watch Anne Hathaway's reaction to Barbra Streisand's Lifetime Achievement Award at the SAG Awards here! (more...)

Go Inside Rehearsals For Disney's HERCULES in Hamburg

February 20, 2024



Go inside rehearsals for the newest Disney musical HERCULES in Hamburg, featuring performances and interviews with the cast and creative team in an all-new video! (more...)

Exclusive: Jennifer Holliday Is Getting Sentimental at Café Carlyle

February 22, 2024



In this video, watch as Broadway legend Jennifer Holliday gives us a sneak peek of her new show at the legendary Cafe Carlyle. (more...)

Meet the New Stars of HADESTOWN- Lola Tung, Jordan Fisher & Ani DiFranco

February 23, 2024



In this video, watch as Lola Tung, Jordan Fisher & Ani DiFranco chat about joining the cast of Hadestown on Broadway. (more...)

Character Breakdown: WATER FOR ELEPHANTS Cast Unpacks Their Roles

February 25, 2024



In this video, watch as the cast of Water for Elephants on Broadway explains what their characters are all about. (more...)

Exclusive: Aisha Jackson is Getting Ready to Spotlight Black Excellence on Broadway

February 21, 2024



In this video, watch as Broadway's Aisha Jackson chats more about her upcoming show and gives BroadwayWorld an exclusive sneak peek of 'Being Good Isn't Good Enough' from Hallelujah, Baby!. (more...)

Get A First Look At BEETLEJUICE in Brazil

February 21, 2024



Get a first look at the Brazil company of Beetlejuice performing The Whole Being Dead Thing in an all-new video. Based on Tim Burton's dearly beloved film, BEETLEJUICE tells the story of Lydia Deetz, a strange and unusual teenager whose life changes when she meets a recently deceased couple and Beetlejuice, a demon with a thing for stripes. (more...)
title: VIDEO: Fifth Harmony Perform, Play 'Flinch' on LATE LATE SHOW Video

meta_data.description: On last night's LATE LATE SHOW, music guest Fifth Harmony performed 'He Like That' for the Stage 56 audience. Later, James invites the women of Fifth Harmony to play a game of Flinch.

twitter.title: VIDEO: Fifth Harmony Perform, Play 'Flinch' on LATE LATE SHOW
